Author: Nectarine-Fast

Comment: The modern age is stuck in a validation death spiral - anyone saying *"I don't think this is such a good idea"* will be silenced/purged while anyone cheering for the team gets rewarded/promoted every step of the way.  Aside from giving us the cartoonish insanity we see in politics today, it also leaks out into regular parts of life. It's the crazy lady fighting the police like it's her heroic last stand, the old western movie brawl out of nowhere *happening anywhere,* the random nobody with a god complex creating a public disturbance because he's high on his own fumes.  All of these people had the internet validating their brains out before they went on their grand spirit journeys.
Author: D_Ethan_Bones
